boy. You know me: I am busy from morning till night and abstemious, so of course I am well." 
"Thank God," said his son smiling. 
"God has nothing to do with it! Well, go on," 
he continued, returning to his hobby; "till me how the Germans have taught you to fight Bo- naparte by this new science you call 'strategy.' " 
Prince Andrew smiled.
